mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.sale_contract_sid, t.sale_contract_code, t.customer_sid, t.company_sid, t.company_brand_sid, t.sale_department, t.contract_type, t.sale_group, t.sale_person, t.refer_project, t.warranty, t.warranty_unit, t.contract_purpose, t.advance_settle_mode, t.remain_settle_mode, t.year, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.contract_name, t.business_channel, t.raw_material_mode, t.sale_mode, t.product_season_sid, t.business_type, t.material_type, t.accounts_method_group, t.accounts_method_group_code, t.tax_rate, t.currency_amount_tax, t.currency_amount, t.currency, t.currency_unit, t.settle_project, t.sale_org, t.allowable_ratio_short, t.allowable_ratio_more, Round(t.allowable_ratio_short * 100, 2) AS allowable_ratio_short_pct, Round(t.allowable_ratio_more * 100, 2) AS allowable_ratio_more_pct, t.customer_contract_code, t.exemption_day, t.toexpire_days, t.upload_status, t.sign_in_status, t.close_status, t.original_sale_contract_sid, t.yushoukuan_remark, t.zhongqikuan_remark, t.weikuan_remark, t.ys_account_valid_days, t.zq_account_valid_days, t.wq_account_valid_days, t.day_type, t.esign_flow_id, t.esign_flow_status, t.esign_flow_desc, t.esign_flow_time, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.contract_tag, t.perform_remark, t.process_type, t.instance_id, t1.customer_code, t1.customer_name, t1.short_name, t2.company_code, t2.company_name, t2.short_name as company_short_name, t3.product_season_code, t3.product_season_name, t4.nick_name, t5.name as advance_settle_mode_name, t6.name as remain_settle_mode_name, t7.name as accounts_method_group_name, t8.name as material_type_name, t9.tax_rate_code, t9.tax_rate_name, t10.code as business_channel_code, t10.name as business_channel_name, t11.nick_name as creator_account_name, t11.user_id as creator_user_id, t12.nick_name as updater_account_name, t13.nick_name as confirmer_account_name, t14.sale_contract_code as original_sale_contract_code, t15.file_path, t16.approval_node, t16.approval_user_id, t16.approval_user_name, t16.create_date as submit_date, t17.nick_name as submit_user_name, t.contract_signer, t.contract_sign_date, t18.nick_name as contract_signer_name, t.outline_agreement_sid, t19.sale_contract_code as outline_agreement_code from s_sal_sale_contract t left join s_bas_customer t1 on t1.customer_sid = t.customer_sid left join s_bas_company t2 on t2.company_sid = t.company_sid left join s_bas_product_season t3 on t3.product_season_sid = t.product_season_sid left join sys_user t4 on t4.user_name = t.sale_person left join s_con_advance_settle_mode t5 on t5.code = t.advance_settle_mode left join s_con_remain_settle_mode t6 on t6.code = t.remain_settle_mode left join s_con_account_method_group t7 on t7.sid = t.accounts_method_group left join s_con_material_type t8 on t8.code = t.material_type left join s_con_tax_rate t9 on t9.tax_rate_value = t.tax_rate left join s_con_business_channel t10 on t10.code = t.business_channel left join sys_user t11 on t11.user_name = t.creator_account left join sys_user t12 on t12.user_name = t.updater_account left join sys_user t13 on t13.user_name = t.confirmer_account left join s_sal_sale_contract t14 on t14.sale_contract_sid = t.original_sale_contract_sid left join s_sal_sale_contract_attach t15 on t.sale_contract_sid = t15.sale_contract_sid and 'XSHT' = t15.file_type left join s_sys_form_process t16 on t.sale_contract_sid = t16.form_id left join sys_user t17 on t16.creator_account = t17.user_name left join sys_user t18 on t.contract_signer = t18.user_name left join s_sal_sale_contract t19 on t.outline_agreement_sid = t19.sale_contract_sid
mapper.insert:
insert into s_sal_sale_contract
client_id, sale_contract_sid, sale_contract_code, customer_sid, company_sid, company_brand_sid, sale_department, contract_type, sale_group, sale_person, refer_project, contract_purpose, warranty, warranty_unit, advance_settle_mode, remain_settle_mode, year, start_date, end_date, contract_name, business_channel, raw_material_mode, sale_mode, product_season_sid, business_type, material_type, accounts_method_group, accounts_method_group_code, tax_rate, currency_amount_tax, currency_amount, currency, currency_unit, settle_project, sale_org, allowable_ratio_short, allowable_ratio_more, customer_contract_code, exemption_day, toexpire_days, upload_status, sign_in_status, close_status, original_sale_contract_sid, yushoukuan_remark, zhongqikuan_remark, weikuan_remark, ys_account_valid_days, zq_account_valid_days, wq_account_valid_days, day_type, contract_signer, contract_sign_date, outline_agreement_sid, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
#{o.clientId}, #{o.saleContractSid}, #{o.saleContractCode}, #{o.customerSid}, #{o.companySid}, #{o.companyBrandSid}, #{o.saleDepartment}, #{o.contractType}, #{o.saleGroup}, #{o.salePerson}, #{o.referProject}, #{o.contractPurpose}, #{o.warranty}, #{o.warrantyUnit}, #{o.advanceSettleMode}, #{o.remainSettleMode}, #{o.year}, #{o.startDate}, #{o.endDate}, #{o.contractName}, #{o.businessChannel}, #{o.rawMaterialMode}, #{o.productSeasonSid}, #{o.businessType}, #{o.materialType}, #{o.accountsMethodGroup}, #{o.accountsMethodGroupCode}, #{o.taxRate}, #{o.currencyAmountTax}, #{o.currencyAmount}, #{o.currency}, #{o.currencyUnit}, #{o.settleMode}, #{o.settleProject}, #{o.saleOrg}, #{o.allowableRatioShort}, #{o.allowableRatioMore}, #{o.customerContractCode}, #{o.exemptionDay}, #{o.toexpireDays}, #{o.uploadStatus}, #{o.signInStatus}, #{o.closeStatus}, #{o.originalSaleContractSid}, #{o.yushoukuanRemark}, #{o.zhongqikuanRemark}, #{o.weikuanRemark}, #{o.ysAccountValidDays}, #{o.zqAccountValidDays}, #{o.wqAccountValidDays}, #{o.dayType}, #{o.contractSigner}, #{o.contractSignDate}, #{o.outlineAgreementSid}, #{o.remark}, #{o.handleStatus}, #{o.creatorAccount}, #{o.createDate}, #{o.updaterAccount}, #{o.updateDate}, #{o.confirmerAccount}, #{o.confirmDate}, #{o.dataSourceSys},
mapper.select: SELECT t1.customer_code, t1.customer_name, t1.short_name, t2.company_code, t2.company_name, t3.product_season_code, t3.product_season_name FROM s_sal_sale_contract t LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t1 ON t1.customer_sid = t.customer_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 ON t2.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t3 ON t3.product_season_sid = t.product_season_sid WHERE t.sale_contract_sid = #{saleContractSid}
select sale_contract_sid, sale_contract_code, contract_name, handle_status, create_date from s_sal_sale_contract where handle_status = '5' order by contract_name

SELECT sale_contract_sid, t.client_id, t.sale_contract_code, t.customer_sid, t.contract_type, t.outline_agreement_sid, t.contract_name, t.year, t.upload_status, t.raw_material_mode, t.sign_in_status, t.handle_status, t.sale_mode, t.currency_amount_tax, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.customer_contract_code, t.exemption_day, t.warranty, t.contract_purpose, t.allowable_ratio_short, t.allowable_ratio_more, t.tax_rate, t.currency, t.currency_unit, t.company_sid, t.company_brand_sid, t.sale_department, t.sale_group, t.sale_person, t.refer_project, t.warranty_unit, t.advance_settle_mode, t.remain_settle_mode, t.business_channel, t.product_season_sid, t.business_type, t.material_type, t.accounts_method_group, t.accounts_method_group_code, t.currency_amount, t.settle_project, t.sale_org, t.yushoukuan_remark, t.zhongqikuan_remark, t.weikuan_remark, t.contract_signer, t.contract_sign_date, t.cancel_remark, t.esign_flow_id, t.esign_flow_status, t.esign_flow_desc, t.esign_flow_time, t.remark, t.close_status, t.original_sale_contract_sid, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.instance_id, t.process_type, t1.short_name AS customer_short_name, t2.user_id AS creator_account_id FROM s_sal_sale_contract t LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t1 ON t.customer_sid = t1.customer_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name AND t.client_id = t2.client_id WHERE (t.handle_status = '5' AND end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND end_date <= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval ${offset} day), '%Y-%m-%d'));

SELECT t.sale_contract_sid, t.client_id, t.sale_contract_code, t.customer_sid, t.contract_type, t.outline_agreement_sid, t.contract_name, t.year, t.upload_status, t.raw_material_mode, t.sign_in_status, t.handle_status, t.sale_mode, t.currency_amount_tax, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.customer_contract_code, t.exemption_day, t.warranty, t.contract_purpose, t.allowable_ratio_short, t.allowable_ratio_more, t.tax_rate, t.currency, t.currency_unit, t.company_sid, t.company_brand_sid, t.sale_department, t.sale_group, t.sale_person, t.refer_project, t.warranty_unit, t.advance_settle_mode, t.remain_settle_mode, t.business_channel, t.product_season_sid, t.business_type, t.material_type, t.accounts_method_group, t.accounts_method_group_code, t.currency_amount, t.settle_project, t.sale_org, t.yushoukuan_remark, t.zhongqikuan_remark, t.weikuan_remark, t.contract_signer, t.contract_sign_date, t.cancel_remark, t.esign_flow_id, t.esign_flow_status, t.esign_flow_desc, t.esign_flow_time, t.remark, t.close_status, t.original_sale_contract_sid, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.instance_id, t.process_type, t1.short_name AS customer_short_name, t2.user_id AS creator_account_id FROM s_sal_sale_contract t LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t1 ON t.customer_sid = t1.customer_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name AND t.client_id = t2.client_id WHERE (t.handle_status = '5' AND end_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'));
